text: 0 Last year, when director Tim Miller ’ s Deadpool movie was filming in Vancouver, I got to visit the set with a few other reporters. While I ’ ve been able to visit a number of movie sets while they ’ ve been filming, getting to see Deadpool get made was something special because of the passion of everyone involved. In case you aren ’ t aware, Miller, Ryan Reynolds, and screenwriters Rhett Reese and Paul Wernick had spent many years trying to get Fox to give them the greenlight and shortly after some test footage leaked and the fan reaction was beyond enthusiastic, Fox finally gave them the go ahead to make their movie – with the added bonus of allowing it to be rated R.
